question.body: Which nutrient is not properly matched with its absorption mechanism?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Glucose is transported from the villi to the blood by co-transport with sodium ions.
Correct. Amino acids are moved from the villi to the blood via co-transport with sodium ions.
Incorrect. Glycerol is moved from the villi to the blood via simple diffusion.
Incorrect. Nucleic acids are moved from the villi to the blood via active transport.
